entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
